source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_00<tab>Dancing Wolf is ready to go on the offensive.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_00<tab>不滅隊：作戦本部のダンシング・ウルフ大闘士は、冒険者に提案があるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_01<tab>After noting that Tristan's attacks have ceased since increasing trade route patrols, Dancing Wolf puts forth his plan to lure the summoner into a trap. He has arranged for a lightly guarded caravan as bait, and would have you and Y'mhitra be present to assist in engaging the dangerous mage. Make your way to Camp Bluefog in northern Thanalan, and speak with the captain to learn the details of the ambush.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_01<tab>ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士は、囮の輸送部隊でトリスタンを罠にかける作戦を計画中だ。その作戦に、冒険者たちにも参加してほしいと頼まれた。北ザナラーンのキャンプ・ブルーフォグにいる「ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive in Camp Bluefog, and Dancing Wolf explains his simple plan: the caravan, carrying a shipment of crystals, will conveniently break an axle on its way to the processing plant. You, Y'mhitra, and the captain are to take up positions nearby, and await Tristan's attack. Head to your assigned position, and stay alert for the black-robed madman.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_02<tab>ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士と話した。作戦は、トラブルが起きて立ち往生する囮の輸送部隊を、冒険者たちが監視して、犯人が出てくるのを待つというもの。北ザナラーンのブルーフォグにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9BD401 /var>」で見渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_03<tab>Lured by the promise of easy plunder, a mage and his flame-enshrouded familiar have appeared and assaulted the caravan. Defeat the ebon-clad summoner and Ifrit-Egi, and put an end to the string of callous attacks.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_03<tab>囮に釣られ、イフリート・エギを使役する黒ローブの人物が現れた。ブルーフォグで「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2101C01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2057A01 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_04<tab>Following a furious exchange of arcane violence, the black-robed villain lies defeated at your feet. Tend now to the wounded courier decoy.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2101C01 /var>と<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2057A01 /var>を倒した。ブルーフォグの「オトリ役の輸送兵」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_05<tab>Dancing Wolf and Y'mhitra join you at the scene of the battle, after defeating opponents of their own. Upon inspecting the body of the summoner, however, the flame captain is astonished to discover that the assailant is not Tristan, but Tristan's elder brother, Kahedin. It is then that the Ascian of the Twelfth Chalice appears, lamenting his decision to employ the siblings as pawns. The Paragon proceeds to laud the primal-slaying efforts of the Bringer of Light, before vanishing as abruptly as he had appeared. Return now to the Hall of Flames in Ul'dah, and discuss these revelations with Dancing Wolf.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_05<tab>冒険者が倒した相手は、死んだはずのトリスタンの兄であり、彼に召喚士の力を与えたのは十二杯のアシエンだった。ひとまず、負傷者をウルダハに運ぼう。不滅隊：作戦本部の「ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_06The identity of the black-robed menace has finally been revealed as the long-dead Kahedin─a reanimated puppet of a powerful Ascian. Though Tristan and his brother are now free of the Paragon's manipulations, Dancing Wolf is intent on exacting vengeance on the callous immortal. Y'mhitra counsels caution, warning that the servants of Darkness are not to be lightly challenged. To that end, the researcher then instructs you in yet another secret of ancient Allagan magicks. Continue your efforts to master the art of summoning that you might benefit from the wisdom hidden within the remaining tomestones.

※The next summoner quest will be available from Dancing Wolf upon reaching level 58.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SEQ_06ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士と話した。死体を操るアシエンを、許すわけにはいかない。奴らとの戦いに備え、さらなる力と魔法を身につけよう。

※召喚士のレベルが58以上になると、不滅隊：作戦本部のダンシング・ウルフ大闘士から次の召喚士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Dancing Wolf at Camp Bluefog.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_00<tab>キャンプ・ブルーフォグでダンシング・ウルフ大闘士と話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9BD401 /var>で周囲を見渡す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_02<tab>Defeat the ebon-clad summoner and Ifrit-Egi.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2101C01 /var>と<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2057A01 /var>を討伐
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_03<tab>オトリ役の輸送兵を救助する

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Dancing Wolf at the Hall of Flames.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_TODO_04<tab>不滅隊：作戦本部のダンシング・ウルフと話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope you are prepared to take action.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_000よく来てくれたな……。
ひとつ提案があるんだが、聞いてくれんか？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_001<tab>Ever since we increased our presence on the trade routes, our black-robed villain has ceased his attacks. Now it is our turn to go on the offensive.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_001クリスタルの流通経路の警護を厚くすることで、
黒いローブの男……トリスタンによる襲撃は起きなくなった。
そこで今度は、こちらからヤツをおびき出したいのだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_002<tab>With the blessings of my superiors, I have arranged for a lightly guarded shipment of crystals with which we will lure Tristan into an ambush.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_002不滅隊の全面的な協力の下、囮の輸送部隊を編成し、
トリスタンを罠にかける作戦を計画した。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_003<tab>And I want you there when we spring the trap! I have already sent word to Y'mhitra, and she will meet us in Camp Bluefog. Let us bring an end to this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_003この作戦に、お前も参加してもらいたい！
もちろん、ヤ・ミトラの嬢ちゃんにも声をかけてある。
準備ができたら、「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」まで来てくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_005<tab>Have you spoken with Captain Wolf? I suggest we follow his orders, and trust in the preparations of the Immortal Flames.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_005ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士から話は聞いた？
今は、彼の指示に従いましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_006<tab>We have been waiting for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let us put Captain Wolf's plan into action!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_006)) (( )) 02 /var>も来たのね。
この作戦で、トリスタンを捕らえましょう……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're here. Good. Our “crystal couriers” have just left camp.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_010待っていたぞ……。
先ほどオトリ役の輸送部隊が出発したところだ。
簡単に作戦を説明しておこう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_011<tab>The plan is simple: the caravan will head towards the processing plant, but conveniently break an axle before reaching the east watchtower.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_011クリスタルを積んだ輸送部隊は、青燐精製所へ向かう途中で、
トラブルが起きて、立ち往生する「予定」になっている。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_012<tab>We three will take up separate positions nearby, and wait for Tristan to take the bait─I've had the driver complaining long and loudly about the lack of a suitable escort for his precious cargo, so we can be reasonably sure that an attack will come.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_012俺たち3人は、それを別の場所から監視し、襲撃を待つ。
今回の輸送計画について、それとなく情報を漏らしてある。
きっと食いついてくれるはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_013<tab>I trust you need no further explanations? Head to your assigned position, and do your best to keep out of sight.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_013……作戦は理解できたな。
それでは各自「」から、周囲を監視してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_020<tab>Is aught amiss? This tree is hardly big enough to conceal the both of us...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_020あら、どうしたの……？
あなたの持ち場はここじゃないはずよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_025<tab>If I've read him aright, Tristan will be unable to resist this lure. But enough talk─take up your position, and keep an eye out for black-robed madmen.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_025囮部隊を使って、トリスタンを誘き出すぞ……！
「」でヤツが来るのを待つんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SOLDIER02103_000_030<tab>...You're here for the ambush? Uh, it's a pleasure to meet you and all, but you'd best keep your distance─we wouldn't want the enemy avoiding our carefully laid trap, eh?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SOLDIER02103_000_030協力してくれる冒険者ってのはあんたかい？
だとしたら、俺に話しかけるのはまずいな……。
敵が来ないうちに、俺から離れろ。

TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SOLDIER02103_000_040……う、うわああああああああああ！
で、ででで、出たぞーーー！！！
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_050<tab>……大丈夫かっ！？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SOLDIER02103_000_051<tab>I... I'll live, Captain. He popped right out of thin air... Took me by surprise...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_SOLDIER02103_000_051え、ええ……なんとか……。
そいつ、何もない空間から忽然と現れて……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_052<tab>The same happened to me. Another man in dark robes stepped through some manner of portal, and assailed me with spells.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_052ここにも、現れていたのね……。
私のところにも黒いローブの男が虚空から現れて、
攻撃してきたわ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_053<tab>My position also came under attack─an underling, judging by the ease with which I dispatched him. But I have never before seen such teleportation magicks...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_053俺の持ち場にも現れた。
幸い、大した腕前じゃなかったが……。
そんな芸当ができるとは、こいつらは……？
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_054<tab>な、なんてこった、こいつは……！！
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_055<tab>……知ってるの、ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_056<tab>This is Kahedin─Tristan's brother! But how...? He was tempered...slain...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_056こいつは、トリスタンの兄貴だ……！
だが、どうして……こいつはイフリートにテンパードにされ、
弟の手で殺されたはずだぞ！？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_057<tab>(-Haughty Voice-)...And now <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> siblings have disappointed me. <sigh> I should exercise more care in choosing my pawns.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_057(-？？？？-)兄弟そろって、不甲斐ない奴らだ……。
せっかく、使ってやったというのにな。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_058<tab>An Ascian!? That voice... You were the one who taught Tristan the art of summoning! Have you come to inflict yet more misery upon the world!?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_058アシエン！？
その声は……トリスタンに召喚魔法を教えたヤツね！
今度はいったい何をするつもり！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_059<tab>...Tristan? Yes, that was the other's name. I had hoped to groom him─granted him the knowledge of Allag's mages that he might unleash his wrath against the primals. Alas, he was all too easily vanquished...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_059……トリスタンか。
蛮神を倒す力として、召喚士の叡智を授けたというのに、
ああも簡単に敗れるとは、期待外れだった……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_060<tab>No matter. The Bringer of Light has proven a more-than-adequate replacement for my failed god-slayer.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_060ククク……だが、そこの光の戦士殿が、
代わりに蛮神を狩って回ってくれ、大いに助かったぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_061<tab>With every primal you kill, the beastmen's fervor grows ever hotter. We need but supply the tribes with crystals...and watch as they summon ever more terrible deities!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_061蛮神が倒されれば、蛮族どもはより強靭な神を求める……。
クリスタルさえあたえてやれば、
何度でも、何度でも、懲りずに蛮神を呼び降ろす！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_062<tab>When the confluence of chaos reaches its peak, the world shall be swallowed in Darkness. Our master shall rise again...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_ASCIANSCUP_000_062そして、世は混沌の闇に包まれるのだ。
我々の望むとおりに……な。
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_063<tab>………………去ったようだな。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_064<tab>And we should be gone as well. I shall see that my soldier is treated for his wounds, then await you outside the Hall of Flames.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_064……もう、ここにいても仕方ない……。
ひとまず負傷者を「ウルダハ」に運ぶとしよう……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_070<tab>Once again, a Paragon lurks behind the curtain, pulling the strings. I should have suspected...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_070ついにアシエンが出てきたわね。
ということは、やっぱりトリスタンは……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_075<tab>...I believe some reassessment is in order. We now know that the black-robed menace we thought to be Tristan was actually his brother, Kahedin─a reanimated puppet, under the control of an Ascian.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_075……少し、状況を整理させてくれ。
俺たちがトリスタンだと思っていた「黒いローブの男」は、
アシエンに傀儡として操られていた、ヤツの兄貴だった……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_076<tab>Both brothers were present at Ifrit's defeat, so Kahedin's aura, too, would have been stained with the primal's essence. Which, if I understand correctly, would explain his ability to command the egi.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_076あいつらは、兄弟でイフリート討伐作戦に参加していた。
確かに、兄貴もイフリートのエーテルを浴びているはず……。
召喚獣を使役する条件は満たしていたということか……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_077<tab>But for that Ascian to raise the lad's corpse and press him into service as his pet summoner... I shall see the blackguard suffer for his cruel depravity!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_DANCINGWOLF_000_077だが、死体を傀儡に、むりやり召喚士として操るとは……！
そのような非道な行為、許してたまるものか！！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_078<tab>Aye, the Paragon has many crimes for which he must answer. But we must move with great caution─the power of these immortals is not to be underestimated.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_078……私も同感よ。
でも、相手がアシエンとなれば、
今まで以上に、警戒して行動する必要があるわ。
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_079<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_080<tab>I will return to Gridania, and redouble my efforts to decipher the remaining tomestones. We cannot face an Ascian unprepared!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN560_02103_YMHITRA_000_080私はグリダニアに戻って、研究を進めてみるから、
アシエンとの決戦に備えてね……！
